title: Random ping spikes
body: Been getting random ping spikes in LoL only and no other game, some games I play with zero issues, then randomly ping issues in another.

replies.body: This might be happening if your network is having issues with packet loss. When some of the data coming to our servers gets corrupted along the way, it can cause some crazy ping spikes or make it look like you champion is moving around on their own. Try using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to test for packet loss, and take a screenshot and the image it gives so I can look over it with you!

Ran the hextech repair and it showed no packet loss, in games I also see other players getting the same issue, sometimes 1 player gets it then it stops, then I start lagging like mad.

Hey Vei,

You may want to try running through the steps in the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if that helps fix your issue!

now the spikes are more consistent than before, where as I used to get get it once every 4 games I'm getting spikes every game now.
